h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
h2_title: How to Access Purple Cloud Mountain
content: The Venom Daoist will be hiding in a large cocoon just past the shrine in a large darkened room. You'll need to break him out of the cocoon, and then defeat this boss (attacking his back to destroy his extra hands will deal major damage and can end the fight early).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Access Purple Cloud Mountain'.
The content is as follows:
The Venom Daoist will be hiding in a large cocoon just past the shrine in a large darkened room. You'll need to break him out of the cocoon, and then defeat this boss (attacking his back to destroy his extra hands will deal major damage and can end the fight early).
